quotes.quote: If we must part forever, Give me but one kind word to think upon, And please myself with, while my heart's breaking.
quotes.author: Thomas Otway

quotes.quote: Modern science is still trying to produce a tranquilizer more effective than a few kind words.
quotes.author: Douglas Meador

quotes.quote: Let a kind word warm you when your thoughts turn cold.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Kind words are salve to a cankered soul; spread generously.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Kind words are such a blessing to the needful, if one but knew the pleasure that they bring.
quotes.author: John McLeod

quotes.quote: Until you have cultivated the habit of saying some kind word of those whom you do not admire, you will be neither successful nor happy.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: They say, You can't give a smile away; it always comes back. The same is true of a kind word or a conversation starter. What goes around, comes around.
quotes.author: Susan RoAne

quotes.quote: Sometimes all it takes is a kind word of encouragement to get your heroes back on the right path.
quotes.author: Nancy Duarte

quotes.quote: Be kind to everyone - you don't know what cross they're bearing and how sweet that kind word might ring.
quotes.author: Ann B. Ross

quotes.quote: Kind words produce their images on men's souls.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: A kind word is like a Spring day.
quotes.author: Russian Proverb

quotes.quote: A kind word will give more pleasure than a present.
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.quote: Never lose a chance of saying a kind word
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: You have it easily in your power to increase the sum total of this world's happiness now. How? By giving a few words of sincere appreciation to someone who is lonely or discouraged. Perhaps you will forget tomorrow the kind words you say today, but the recipient may cherish them over a lifetime.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Kind hearts are the gardens, Kind thoughts are the roots, Kind words are the blossoms, Kind deeds are the fruits.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A couple of kind words can not only make a person's day, but earn you a friend and supporter for life. For the rest of the week, whenever you see someone you want to judge negatively, pay them a compliment instead. See what happens.
quotes.author: Neil Strauss

quotes.quote: Give a kind word (with a kindly thought behind the word) — you will be kind and receive kind words.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Be nice to people whether you mean it or not. You never know when a kind word can make a difference in another person’s day – or maybe even his or her life.
quotes.author: Cassandra King

quotes.quote: Every day, tell at least one person something you like, admire, or appreciate about them.
quotes.author: Richard Carlson

quotes.quote: Your words have power. Speak words that are kind, loving, positive, uplifting, encouraging, and life-giving.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's funny how complete strangers can have familiar souls.
quotes.author: J. Iron Ward

quotes.quote: Giving someone a piece of your soul is better than giving a piece of your heart. Because souls are eternal.
quotes.author: Helen Boswel

quotes.quote: And when one of them meets the other half, the actual half of himself, whether he be a lover of youth or a lover of another sort, the pair are lost in an amazement of love and friendship and intimacy and one will not be out of the other's sight, as I may say, even for a moment.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: There was something in her eyes that made me trust her. Maybe it was because they held the same cynicism, the same world-weariness I saw in my own every morning when I looked at myself in the mirror.
quotes.author: Melika Dannese Lux

quotes.quote: Life is a lease and God is the landlord.
quotes.author: Sarah Strohmeyer

quotes.quote: It goes without saying that any persons may attempt to unite kindred spirits, but, whatever their hopes and longings, none have the right to impose their vision of unity upon the rest.
quotes.author: Robert Nozick

quotes.quote: You have half our gifts. I the other. Together we make a whole. Together we are much more powerful.
quotes.author: Joss Stirling

quotes.quote: Love consists in this, that two solitudes protect and touch and greet each other.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: There's something beautiful about finding one's innermost thoughts in another.
quotes.author: Oliver Schreiner

quotes.quote: Find my hand in the darkness, intertwined you will be the day to my night. We can share wings and take flight towards our own inner light.
quotes.author: Truth Devour

quotes.quote: A soulmate is someone who has locks that fit our keys, and keys to fit our locks. When we feel safe enough to open the locks, our truest selves step out and we can be completely and honestly who we are; we can be loved for who we are and not for who we're pretending to be. Each unveils the best part of the other. No matter what else goes wrong around us, with that one person, we're safe in our own paradise.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Kindred spirits are not so scarce as I used to think. It's splendid to find out there are so many of them in the world.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: There's magic in recognizing a kindred spirit, and an even greater power in letting yourself love them. When it scares you, let it - that's your ego letting go.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Koyanagi

quotes.quote: We all take different paths in life, but no matter where we go, we take a little of each other everywhere.
quotes.author: Tim McGraw

quotes.quote: Kindred spirits alone do not change with the changing years.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: It is an absolute human certainty that no one can know his own beauty or perceive a sense of his own worth until it has been reflected back to him in the mirror of another loving, caring human being.
quotes.author: John Joseph Powell

quotes.quote: We are soul mates, kindred spirits, on a deep, fundamental level I believe we were made for each other. Who cares if we make each other mad occasionally. The universe planned our existence. That has to count for something.
quotes.author: Beau Taplin

quotes.quote: You are the master of my heart. I am a slave to you're soul. Intertwined in a perfect embrace that I will never release myself from.
quotes.author: Truth Devour

quotes.quote: True friends are always together in spirit.
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a 'self-made' man. We are made up of thousands of others.
quotes.author: George Matthew Adams

quotes.quote: Have you ever felt really close to someone? So close that you can't understand why you and the other person have two separate bodies, two separate skins?
quotes.author: Nancy Garden

quotes.quote: With some, we're certain our hearts must have been acquainted, long before we ever met them.
quotes.author: Shakieb Orgunwall

quotes.quote: Soul mates recognise one another's vibration. They instantly fuse to the life force that surrounds their core of being.
quotes.author: Truth Devour

quotes.quote: To discover a kindred spirit is to find your heart in the heart of a friend.
quotes.author: Ann Parrish

quotes.quote: Some people as far as your senses are concerned, just feel like home.
quotes.author: High Fidelity

quotes.quote: No one is contained by his own skin, but shares his birth, living and death with others.
quotes.author: James Brooks

quotes.quote: People who feel empowered by your presence become kindred spirits.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Maybe the two different worlds we lived in weren't so different. We saw the same sunset.
quotes.author: The Outsiders

quotes.quote: You are truly home only when you find your tribe.
quotes.author: Srividya Srinivasan

quotes.quote: The measure of space & time creates an echo of haunting distance between us, yet we are close, we are united in the love we forge together.
quotes.author: Truth Devour

quotes.quote: Love is but the discovery of ourselves in another, and the delight in the recognition.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.quote: Twin flames burn eternal. Destine to shine bright in a united embrace that is set to last for an eternity.
quotes.author: Truth Devour

quotes.quote: Our universe grants every soul a twin, a reflection of themselves, the kindred spirit, and no matter where they are or how far away they are from each other, even if they are in different dimensions, they will always find one another. This is destiny; this is love.
quotes.author: Julie Dillon

quotes.quote: You are the missing piece of my heart and soul. United we are now whole.
quotes.author: Truth Devour

quotes.quote: Birds of a feather flock together.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: It's always nice to be around kindred spirits who care about the earth.
quotes.author: Carol Nelson

quotes.quote: Two may talk together under the same roof for many years, yet never really meet; and two others at first speech are old friends.
quotes.author: Mary Catherwood

quotes.quote: Than smoke and mist who better could appraise, the kindred spirit of an inner haze?
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: A bond between souls is ancient â€“ older than the planet.
quotes.author: Dianna Hardy

quotes.quote: We are kindred spirits, you and I... One day you will realize you don't have to fight your nature. You can live your life freely... I want to be there when that happens.
quotes.author: T.T. Escurel

quotes.quote: Kindness is in our power, even when fondness is not.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Unexpected kindness is the most powerful, least costly, and most underrated agent of human change.
quotes.author: Bob Kerrey

quotes.quote: For it is in giving that we receive.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.quote: He who sees a need and waits to be asked for help is as unkind as if he had refused it.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Real kindness seeks no return; What return can the world make to rain clouds?
quotes.author: Tiruvalluvar

quotes.quote: Three things in human life are important: the first is to be kind; the second is to be kind; and the third is to be kind.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the grandest intention.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Do your little bit of good where you are; it's those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: Be kind. Always if you have a choice, be kind.
quotes.author: Anne Rice

quotes.quote: A kind gesture can reach a wound that only compassion can heal.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Every single time you help somebody stand up you are helping humanity rise.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Kindness, I've discovered, is everything in life.
quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quotes.quote: One of the most difficult things to give away is kindness; usually it comes back to you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Remember there's no such thing as a small act of kindness. Every act creates a ripple with no logical end.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: If a person seems wicked, do not cast him away. Awaken him with your words, elevate him with your deeds, repay his injury with your kindness. Do not cast him away; cast away his wickedness.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The words of kindness are more healing to a drooping heart than balm or honey.
quotes.author: Sarah Fielding

quotes.quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
quotes.author: Tenzin Gyatso

quotes.quote: No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: No one has ever become poor by giving.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Kindness can transform someone's dark moment with a blaze of light. You'll never know how much your caring matters. Make a difference for another today.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Kindness is loving people more than they deserve.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Practice kindness - particularly when you feel irritated or things are not going well. Kindness hardly ever goes wrong.
quotes.author: Lewis Richmond

quotes.quote: No act of kindness is too small. The gift of kindness may start as a small ripple that over time can turn into a tidal wave affecting the lives of many.
quotes.author: Kevin Heath

quotes.quote: Guard well within yourself that treasure, kindness. Know how to give without hesitation, how to lose without regret, how to acquire without meanness.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.quote: You can't live a perfect day without doing something for someone who will never be able to repay you.
quotes.author: Debbie Macomber

quotes.quote: Kindness is the golden chain by which society is bound together.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Kindness, like a boomerang, always returns.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a harder battle.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Constant kindness can accomplish much. As the sun makes ice melt, kindness causes misunderstanding, mistrust, and hostility to evaporate.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Kindness is an inner desire that makes us want to do good things even if we do not get anything in return. It is the joy of our life to do them. When we do good things from this inner desire, there is kindness in everything we think, say, want and do.
quotes.author: Emanuel Swedenborg

quotes.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Don't be reckless with other people's hearts, and don't put up with people that are reckless with yours.
quotes.author: Mary Schmich

quotes.quote: All I'm saying is, kindness don't have no boundaries.
quotes.author: Kathryn Stockett

quotes.quote: Kindness can become its own motive. We are made kind by being kind.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the greatest intention.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: But remember, boy, that a kind act can sometimes be as powerful as a sword.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: Being kind to someone, only to look kind to others, defeats the purpose of being kind.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: A single act of kindness throws out roots in all directions, and the roots spring up and make new trees.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: Human kindness has never weakened the stamina or softened the fiber of a free people. A nation does not have to be cruel to be tough.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Kindness holds the key to the secret of our own transformation and, in the process, of the transformation of the world.
quotes.author: Jean Maalouf

quotes.quote: Tenderness and kindness are not signs of weakness and despair, but manifestations of strength and resolution.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Our kindness may be the most persuasive argument for that which we believe.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: A little kindness from person to person is better than a vast love for all humankind.
quotes.author: Richard Dehmel

quotes.quote: You cannot do a kindness too soon, for you never know how soon it will be too late.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If you treat people right they will treat you right ... ninety percent of the time.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The simplest acts of kindness are by far more powerful then a thousand heads bowing in prayer.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: What friends or kindred can be so close and intimate as the powers of our soul, which, whether we will or no, must ever bear us company?
quotes.author: Teresa of Avila

quotes.quote: It is only kindred griefs that draw forth our tears, and each weeps really for himself.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: A family stitched together with love seldom unravels.
quotes.author: Letty Cottin Pogrebin

quotes.quote: Kindred objects kindred thoughts inspire, as summer clouds flash forth electric fire.
quotes.author: Samuel Rogers

quotes.quote: Kindred weaknesses induce friendships as often as kindred virtues.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: He who understands you is greater kin to you than your own brother. For even your own kindred neither understand you nor know your true worth.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: All living things on earth are kindred.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: If you hire relatives, you'll have a payroll that won't quit.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: Blood relatives often have nothing to do with family, and similarly, family is about who you choose to make your life with.
quotes.author: Oliver Hudson

quotes.quote: The clan is nothing more than a larger family, with its patriarchal chief as the natural head, and the union of several clans by intermarriage and voluntary connection constitutes the tribe.
quotes.author: Charles Alexander Eastman

quotes.quote: Family is a transitive property.
quotes.author: Catherynne M Valente

quotes.quote: A family needs a father to anchor it.
quotes.author: L. Tom Perry

quotes.quote: Even a family needs to work as a team.
quotes.author: Marques Houston

quotes.quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The family is more sacred than the state.
quotes.author: Pope Pius XI

quotes.quote: The family is the nucleus of civilization.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.quote: The family is one of nature's masterpieces.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: The family is a haven in a heartless world.
quotes.author: Christopher Lasch

quotes.quote: When the family dies, the nation follows...
quotes.author: Mark Steyn

quotes.quote: The family is the corner stone of our society.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: The family is where most of our joy comes from.
quotes.author: Aidan Quinn

quotes.quote: Family likeness has often a deep sadness in it.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Happy families are all alike; every unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Family... a group experience of love and support.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: No family is ever what it seems from the outside.
quotes.author: Lady Violet

quotes.quote: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: A large family makes you accept sharing your parents.
quotes.author: Martha Reeves

quotes.quote: The greater the kindred is, the lesse the kindnesse must bee.
quotes.author: John Lyly

quotes.quote: Family makes a house a home.
quotes.author: Jennifer Hudson

quotes.quote: Family time is the best time.
quotes.author: Carmelo Anthony

quotes.quote: Family is a place where love never ends.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Family pride entertains many unsocial opinions.
quotes.author: Johann Georg Zimmermann

quotes.quote: Kindred spirits alone do not change with the changing years.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
quotes.author: David Ogden Stiers

quotes.quote: Sticking with your family is what makes it a family.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: No family is perfect, and that's true. None of us are.
quotes.author: Tammy Bruce

quotes.quote: A family has its own rituals and its own superstitions.
quotes.author: Téa Obreht

quotes.quote: Searching for our kindred dead isn't just a hobby. It is a fundamental responsibility for all members of the Church. We believe that life continues after death and that all will be resurrected.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: Kings are the slaves of history.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Too many kings can ruin an army
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: For surely a king is first a man. And so it must follow that a king does as all men do: the best he can.
quotes.author: Cameron Dokey

quotes.quote: The King did what all wise husbands do. He did as he was told.
quotes.author: Toby Forward

quotes.quote: …every King must have a fool or risk becoming the fool himself.
quotes.author: W.H. Mitchell

quotes.quote: There is no king who has not had a slave among his ancestors, and no slave who has not had a king among his.
quotes.author: Hellen Keller

quotes.quote: Kings fight for empires, madmen for applause.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: A king may be a tool, a thing of straw; but if he serves to frighten our enemies, and secure our property, it is well enough; a scarecrow is a thing of straw, but it protects the corn.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: All kings is mostly rapscallions.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Kings in this world should imitate God, their mercy should be above their works.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Kings are like stars -- they rise and set, they have the worship of the world, but no repose.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: A king that would not feel his crown too heavy for him, must wear it every day, but if he think it too light, he knoweth not of what metal it is made.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: Kings ought to differ from their subjects, not in kind, but in perfection.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: To be a king and wear a crown is a thing more glorious to them that see it than it is pleasant to them that bear it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth I

quotes.quote: Kings are never without flatterers to seduce them, ambition to deprive them, and desires to corrupt them.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: He who reigns within himself and rules passions, desires, and fears is more than a king.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Kings also sleep; but the clever ones, with one eye open, just like dolphins and whales.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Every man is a king so long as he has someone to look down on.
quotes.author: Sinclair Lewis

quotes.quote: Kings need not raise their voices to be heard.
quotes.author: V.E. Schwab

quotes.quote: A king without power is an absurdity.
quotes.author: James Monroe

quotes.quote: Great kings began as great boys
quotes.author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quotes.quote: He is a king who fears nothing, he is a king who desires nothing!
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: A king is a thing men have made for their own sakes, for quietness sake. Just as in a family one man is appointed to buy the meat.
quotes.author: John Selden

quotes.quote: You had better have one King than five hundred.
quotes.author: Charles II

quotes.quote: A king is a living law.
quotes.author: Claudius

quotes.quote: Magistrates rule by an established rotation; kings reign for life.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The king's name is a tower of strength, which they upon the adverse party want.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Kings govern by popular assemblies only when they cannot do without them.
quotes.author: Charles James Fox

quotes.quote: A teardrop on earth summons the King of heaven.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Create like a god, command like a king, work like a slave.
quotes.author: Constantin Brancusi

quotes.quote: Man will never be free until the last king is strangled with the entrails of the last priest.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: In the kingdom of the blind, the one-eyed man is king.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: Wise kings generally have wise counselors, and he must be a wise man himself who is capable of distinguishing one.
quotes.author: Diogenes

quotes.quote: I'd rather be the king of kids, than the prince of fools.
quotes.author: Jack Black

quotes.quote: Number one, cash is king number two, communicate number three, buy or bury the competition.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: He is happiest, be he king or peasant, who finds peace in his home.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Yesterday we obeyed kings and bent our necks before emperors. But today we kneel only to truth, follow only beauty, and obey only love.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Kindness and faithfulness keep a king safe, through kindness his throne is made secure.
quotes.author: King Solomon

quotes.quote: The king reigns but does not govern.
quotes.author: Louis Adolphe Thiers

quotes.quote: One weeps not save when one is afraid, and that is why kings are tyrants.
quotes.author: Marquis De Sade

quotes.quote: The king must die so that the country can live.
quotes.author: Maximilien Robespierre

quotes.quote: Time is the king of all men, he is their parent and their grave and gives them what he will and not what they crave.
quotes.author: Pericles

quotes.quote: I am indeed a king because I know how to rule myself.
quotes.author: Pietro Aretino

quotes.quote: There will be no end to the troubles of states,Or of humanity itself,Till philosophers become kings in this world,Or till those we now call kings and rulers really And truly become philosophers
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: No reliance can be placed on the friendship of kings, nor vain hope put in the melodious voice of boys; for that passes away like a vision, and this vanishes like a dream.
quotes.author: Saadi

quotes.quote: Neither soldiers nor money can defend a king but only friends won by good deeds, merit, and honesty.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: The enemies cannot destroy the king who has at his service the respect and friendship of the wise men who can find fault, disagree, and correct him.
quotes.author: Thiruvalluvar

quotes.quote: There is no man in this world without some manner of tribulation or anguish, though he be king or pope.
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.quote: He that can work is born to be king of something.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Whoso pulleth out this sword of this stone and anvil is rightwise king born of all England.
quotes.author: Thomas Malory

quotes.quote: Through talk, we tamed kings, restrained tyrants, averted revolution
quotes.author: Tony Benn

quotes.quote: The day of the sun is like the day of a king. It is a promenade in the morning, a sitting on the throne at noon, a pageant in the evening.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: That the king can do no wrong is a necessary and fundamental principle of the English constitution.
quotes.author: William Blackstone

quotes.quote: History has remembered the kings and warriors because they destroyed art has remembered the people because they created.
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.quote: Time's glory is to command contending kings, To unmask falsehood, and bring truth to light.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Like Patience gazing on kings' graves, and smiling Extremity out of act.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: This magistrate is not the king. The people are the king.
quotes.author: Gouverneur Morris

quotes.quote: In the kingdom of the blind, the one-eyed man is king.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: There can be noÂ KingdomÂ of God in the world without theÂ KingdomÂ of God in our hearts.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: The outerÂ kingdomÂ is not our real home. The innerÂ kingdomÂ is our everything.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: A dividedÂ kingdomÂ cannot defend itself from its adversaries. A divided person cannot face life in a dignified way.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: To pass through the door that leads to God'sÂ kingdom, we must go down on our knees.
quotes.author: Catherine Doherty

quotes.quote: The plantÂ kingdomÂ covers the entire earth, offering our senses great pleasure and the delights of summer.
quotes.author: Carl Linnaeus

quotes.quote: TheÂ kingdomÂ of heaven was never intended to indulge the ease of triflers, but to the rest of them that labor.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.quote: The frontiers of theÂ kingdomÂ of God were never advanced by men and women of caution.
quotes.author: John Oswald Sanders

quotes.quote: AÂ kingdomÂ man understands that God never said a godly life would be easy; He just said it would be worth it.
quotes.author: Tony Evans

quotes.quote: If theÂ KingdomÂ of God is in you, you should leave a little bit of heaven wherever you go.
quotes.author: Cornel West

quotes.quote: No one can ever enter the celestial kingdom unless he is strictly honest.
quotes.author: Joseph Smith, Jr.

quotes.quote: When we pursueÂ kingdomÂ principles above His presence, we are looking for theÂ kingdomÂ without a king.
quotes.author: Bill Johnson

quotes.quote: Outside theÂ kingdomÂ of the Lord there is no nation which is greater than any other. God and history will remember your judgment.
quotes.author: Haile Selassie

quotes.quote: TheÂ KingdomÂ of Heaven is not for the well-meaning: it is for the desperate.
quotes.author: James Denney

quotes.quote: An earthlyÂ kingdomÂ cannot exist without inequality of persons. Some must be free, some serfs, some rulers, some subjects.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: If you have not chosen the Kingdom of God first, it will in the end make no difference what you have chosen instead.
quotes.author: William Law

quotes.quote: AÂ kingdomÂ is not lost by a single defeat.
quotes.author: Robert E. Howard

quotes.quote: OtherÂ kingdoms are still present on earth along with theÂ kingdomÂ of the heavens. That is the human condition.
quotes.author: Dallas Willard

quotes.quote: TheÂ kingdomÂ of music is not theÂ kingdomÂ of this world.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: NoÂ KingdomÂ can be secured otherwise than by arming the people. The possession of arms is the distinction between a freeman and a slave.
quotes.author: James Burgh

quotes.quote: A kingdom founded on injustice never lasts.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: TheÂ KingdomÂ of God is not a matter of getting individuals to heaven, but of transforming the life on earth into the harmony of heaven.
quotes.author: Walter Rauschenbusch

quotes.quote: TheÂ kingdomÂ of God is just behind the darkness of closed eyes, and the first gate that opens to it is your peace.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: TheÂ kingdomÂ that Jesus preached and lived was all about a glorious, uproarious, absurd generosity.
quotes.author: N. T. Wright

quotes.quote: In the animal kingdom, the rule is, eat or be eaten; in the human kingdom, define or be defined.
quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

quotes.quote: TheÂ kingdomÂ of God is the true ecology of the human soul.
quotes.author: Dallas Willard

quotes.quote: In the kingdom of heaven it is His work that will be crowned, not yours. Anything in you that He has not wrought Himself will count for nothing.
quotes.author: Johannes Tauler

quotes.quote: The 'kingdom of Heaven' is a condition of the heart - not something that comes 'upon the earth' or 'after death.'
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: No kingdom has shed more blood than the kingdom of Christ.
quotes.author: Charles de Montesquieu

quotes.quote: The kingdom of God is an order of government established by divine authority. It is the only legal government that can exist in any part of the universe.
quotes.author: Orson Pratt

quotes.quote: The Kingdom of Heaven is not a place, but a state of mind.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: AÂ kingdomÂ that has once been destroyed can never come again into being; nor can the dead ever be brought back to life.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: In theÂ kingdom, the greater our responsibilities, the greater is our need to see ourselves as servants.
quotes.author: Spencer W. Kimball

quotes.quote: TheÂ kingdomÂ of heaven is closer than the brow above the eye but mankind does not see it.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Whatever else it is, theÂ kingdomÂ of God is decidedly not a call to violent revolution.
quotes.author: Philip Yancey

quotes.quote: As every divided kingdom falls, so every mind divided between many studies confounds and saps itself.
quotes.author: Leonardo DaVinci

quotes.quote: If theÂ kingdomÂ of God is not first, it doesn't matter what's second.
quotes.author: Neal A. Maxwel

quotes.quote: TheÂ KingdomÂ of Heaven is a military autocracy and there is no public opinion in it.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: God's Kingdom isn't divided into areas of important people and areas of little people. In God's sight, everyone's needful.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: In aÂ kingdomÂ of thieves, the ways of an honest man will always be a crime.
quotes.author: Dennis Adonis

quotes.quote: If you don't enter theÂ kingdomÂ of heaven by God's way, you cannot enter at all.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: The seeking of theÂ kingdomÂ of God is the chief business of the Christian life.
quotes.author: Jonathan Edwards

quotes.quote: The kingdom of heaven is like electricity. You don't see it. It is within you.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.quote: Kissing is a means of getting two people so close together that they can't see anything wrong with each other.
quotes.author: Rene Yasenek

quotes.quote: Any man who can drive safely while kissing a pretty girl is simply not giving the kiss the attention it deserves.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Kissing is like drinking salted water. You drink, and your thirst increases.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Kissing is a merging of two lips, two souls and two spirits that makes them divine.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Kissing you is like dancing in the rain; it is an exciting kind of sensation that you can't help but fall in love with.
quotes.author: Melissa

quotes.quote: Kissing may not spread germs, but they certainly lower resistance.
quotes.author: Louise Erickson

quotes.quote: Her lips on his could tell him better than all her stumbling words.
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.quote: Lips that taste of tears, they say, Are the best for kissing.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Ancient lovers believed a kiss would literally unite their souls, because the spirit was said to be carried in one's breath.
quotes.author: Eve Glicksman

quotes.quote: Soul meets soul on lovers' lips.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: I can't read lips unless they're touching mine.
quotes.author: Jon Troast

quotes.quote: The decision to kiss for the first time is the most crucial in any love story. It changes the relationship of two people much more strongly than even the final surrender; because this kiss already has within it that surrender.
quotes.author: Emil Ludwig

quotes.quote: Ancient lovers believed a kiss would literally unite their souls, because the spirit was said to be carried in one's breath.
quotes.author: Eve Glicksman

quotes.quote: There is the kiss of welcome and of parting, the long, lingering, loving, present one; the stolen, or the mutual one; the kiss of love, of joy, and of sorrow; the seal of promise and receipt of fulfillment.
quotes.author: Thomas C. Haliburton

quotes.quote: Kissing your hand may make you feel very very good but a diamond and sapphire bracelet lasts forever.
quotes.author: Anita Loos

quotes.quote: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.quote: Stolen kisses are always sweetest.
quotes.author: Leigh Hunt

quotes.quote: A kiss can be a comma, a question mark or an exclamation point. That's basic spelling that every woman ought to know.
quotes.author: Mistinguett

quotes.quote: I wasn't kissing her, I was whispering in her mouth.
quotes.author: Chico Marx

quotes.quote: Women still remember the first kiss after men have forgotten the last.
quotes.author: Remy de Gourmont

quotes.quote: It is the passion that is in a kiss that gives to it its sweetness; it is the affection in a kiss that sanctifies it.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: A kiss makes the heart young again and wipes out the years.
quotes.author: Rupert Brooke

quotes.quote: When I kiss you, I can taste your soul.
quotes.author: Carrie Latet

quotes.quote: We turned on one another deep, drowned gazes, and exchanged a kiss that reduced my bones to rubber and my brain to gruel.
quotes.author: Peter De Vries

quotes.quote: Is not a kiss the very autograph of love
quotes.author: Henry Finck

quotes.quote: A friend is always good to have, but a lover's kiss is better than angels raining down on me.
quotes.author: Dave Matthews

quotes.quote: A kiss that is never tasted, is forever and ever wasted.
quotes.author: Billie Holiday

quotes.quote: You may conquer with the sword, but you are conquered by a kiss.
quotes.author: Daniel Heinsius

quotes.quote: A kiss is something you cannot give without taking and cannot take without giving.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: What of soul was left, I wonder, when the kissing had to stop
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Kisses are a better fate than wisdom.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.quote: The moment eternal - just that and no more - When ecstasy's utmost we clutch at the core While cheeks burn, arms open, eyes shut, and lips meet!
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: With a kiss let us set out for an unknown world.
quotes.author: Alferd De Musset

quotes.quote: If it's the first kiss, it's important for the eyes to be closed so you know it's real. It's almost like a Disney movie!
quotes.author: Joe Jonas

quotes.quote: Never a lip is curved with pain that can't be kissed into smiles again.
quotes.author: Bret Harte

quotes.quote: I can forget my very existence in a deep kiss of you.
quotes.author: Byron Caldwell Smith

quotes.quote: The sound of a kiss is not so loud as that of a cannon, but its echo lasts a great deal longer.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendall Holmes

quotes.quote: A kiss may ruin a human life.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Love at the lips was touch as sweet as I could bear.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Once he drew with one long kiss My whole soul through my lips, As sunlight drinketh dew.
quotes.author: Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: My heart smiled when you kissed my lips. What a sweet surprise.
quotes.author: Jan Arden

quotes.quote: A kiss shares things that words find hard to express.
quotes.author: LJ

quotes.quote: Hugging closes the door to hate. Kissing opens the door to love.
quotes.author: Tony Davis

quotes.quote: There is something almost magical about kissing the one you love... time is no more as lips touch, the art of tenderness displayed and emotion and passions ignite into flame.
quotes.author: LJ

quotes.quote: Never close your lips to those whom you have opened your heart.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Once he drew, with one long kiss my whole soul through my lips.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Take it and return it: the kiss of love.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Kisses that are easily obtained are easily forgotten.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: A kiss, when all is said, what is it? A rosy dot placed on the i in loving; 'Tis a secret told to the mouth instead of to the ear.
quotes.author: Edmond Rostand

quotes.quote: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: A kiss is one of the most significant exchanges two people can have, serving as an unspoken language to convey our deepest feelings when words simply will not do.
quotes.author: Sheril Kirshenbaum

quotes.quote: Kiss is a symbol of love and desire to a perfunctory greeting between family and friends, this act can have innumerable meanings and resonances.
quotes.author: Sheril Kirshenbaum

quotes.quote: Some kisses are sealed forever in our minds and hearts, while others are forgotten as quickly as they occur.
quotes.author: Sheril Kirshenbaum

quotes.quote: Across continents and time, kissing is one of the most important activities in our lives, yet its real nature has been too often overlooked by scientists and laypeople alike.
quotes.author: Sheril Kirshenbaum

quotes.quote: For many of us, kiss is a part of our earliest introduction to planet earth, and is often involved in our final exit as well.
quotes.author: Sheril Kirshenbaum

quotes.quote: A kiss is like a window into someone's inner thoughts.
quotes.author: William Cane

quotes.quote: You can sense the mood of the person you're kissing. You can often tell how they really feel about you from a kiss.
quotes.author: William Cane

quotes.quote: Another thing I like about kissing is that it always foreshadows what might be coming.
quotes.author: William Cane

quotes.quote: Kissing is more than mere technique. It's passion, romance, and above all love.
quotes.author: William Cane

quotes.quote: Kissing is such a connection! I mean it's nearly impossible to kiss someone and not stay physically and mentally involved.
quotes.author: William Cane

quotes.quote: A kiss is the seal of affection.
quotes.author: J. Beaumont

quotes.quote: Kisses are the messenger of love.
quotes.author: Opitz

quotes.quote: There is much virtue in a kiss of honest love.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: There is some mysterious virtue in a kiss, after all.
quotes.author: Miss Annie C Johnson

quotes.quote: There is magic in a kiss that doth disarm all force.
quotes.author: Cowley

quotes.quote: A kiss is not the feast; it is an invitation to the feast.
quotes.author: J Randolph

quotes.quote: A kiss is the door that opens the citadel of the heart.
quotes.author: De Levis

quotes.quote: A simple kiss from my mother made me a painter.
quotes.author: B West

quotes.quote: The strength of a kiss is generally measured by its length.
quotes.author: Byron

quotes.quote: A kiss is at once the token of boldness, confidence, and affection.
quotes.author: Niphus

quotes.quote: A kiss given and received is the token of love offered and accepted.
quotes.author: JP Brown

quotes.quote: The acme of human happiness is that we may kiss whom we please, and please whom we kiss.
quotes.author: Miss S Prichard

quotes.quote: It is delightful to kiss the eyelashes of the beloved; but never so delightful as when fresh tears are on them.
quotes.author: WS Landor

quotes.quote: When two hearts are surcharged with love's electricity, a kiss is the burning contact, the wild, leaping flame of love's enthusiasm.
quotes.author: GD Prentice

quotes.quote: Though a lover be never so great an orator, yet a kiss on the lips of his beloved is often more eloquent than all his fine speech.
quotes.author: J Bodenham

quotes.quote: Kisses are like grains of gold or silver found upon the ground, of no value themselves, but precious as showing that a mine is near.
quotes.author: G Villiers

quotes.quote: I came to feel how far above all fancy, pride, and fickle maidenhood, all earthly pleasure, all imagined good, was the warm tremble of a devout kiss.
quotes.author: J Keats

quotes.quote: The soul as one leaf is plucked, all its mates easily fall after; and a kiss may sometimes break out the first leaf.
quotes.author: Mrs. John Sanford

quotes.quote: Deal gently with those who stray; draw by love and persuasion; a kiss is worth a thousand kicks; a kind word is more valuable than a mine of gold.
quotes.author: C Dickens

quotes.quote: I cannot tell you whether there is any particular etiquette to be observed in administering a kiss; the great beauty of a kiss lies in its impulsiveness, and in its impressibility.
quotes.author: HW Shaw

quotes.quote: Kissing an unwilling pair of lips is as mean a victory as robbing a bird's nest, and kissing too willing ones, is about as unfragrant a recreation as making bouquets out of dandelions.
quotes.author: J Brientnall

quotes.quote: A kiss fairly electrifies you; no language expresses it. A kiss is as old as creation; Eve learned it in paradise, and was taught its beauties, virtues, and varieties by an angel, for there is something so transcendent in it.
quotes.author: A Clyde

quotes.quote: The force of gravity seems no longer to be in effect, at the kiss transports the lovers tp another plane of existence--high above the mundane.
quotes.author: M. Danesi

quotes.quote: Kissing is not imprinted in our genes; rather, it is product of cultural events that took courtship away from the control of the family, making it a matter of personal choice.
quotes.author: M. Danesi

quotes.quote: Kissing, though, is a wondrous, collaborative act. It is one of the most recognizable, simple expressions in our physical vocabulary.
quotes.author: Barbara Levine

quotes.quote: When tit comes to romance, it is universally acknowledged that kissing is not only a rewarding end in itself, but a prelude to something more.
quotes.author: Barbara Levine

quotes.quote: Kiss me, and you will see how important I am.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: Sometimes the anticipation of your first kiss is the best part. Taking your time to build up the attraction and excitement makes you first kiss that much more unforgettable--and wonderfully, passionately explosive.
quotes.author: Violet Blue

quotes.quote: As we evolved the kiss was able to reveal even more, including the kisser's likely intentions and aspects of his or her personality.
quotes.author: Erin Agutter

quotes.quote: The first kiss, whether it's your first kiss with a particular person or your first kiss ever, is always special.
quotes.author: Erin Agutter

quotes.quote: A kiss can be a comma, question mark or an exclamation point. That's basic spelling that every woman ought to know.
quotes.author: Jean Marie

quotes.quote: Kissing. It conjures up a swash of wonderful emotions, sensations and meanings.
quotes.author: Andrea Demirjian

quotes.quote: Originally an instinctual prelude to matting, kissing transformed humankind be becoming the universal glue that binds.
quotes.author: Andrea Demirjian

quotes.quote: Kissing. A nonverbal communication that declares a thousand things.
quotes.author: Andrea Demirjian

quotes.quote: A kiss is both given and received. It's spontaneous. Unique. Intuitive. Secretive. Affectionate. Passionate. Romantic and blissful.
quotes.author: Andrea Demirjian

quotes.quote: A kiss can't be faked. Its duality can bring great joy. Or deep sorrow. Render you weak. Or brave. Vulnerable. Or invincible.
quotes.author: Andrea Demirjian

quotes.quote: Every young lover is a voyager and the first kiss is the safe harbor toward which each captain steers his vessel. Beyond all else it is the first kiss that is the goal to be reached if love is to ignite.
quotes.author: William Cane

quotes.quote: Although we're all born with the ability to pucker and pout, the art of kissing really develops and blossoms with rehearsal.
quotes.author: William Cane

quotes.quote: We are all mortal until the first kiss and the second glass of wine.
quotes.author: Eduardo Galeana

quotes.quote: Alas, poor heart / That kiss is comfortless / As frozen water to a starved snake.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The fondest memories are made when gathered around the table
quotes.author: Emma Reed

quotes.quote: Everything happens in the kitchen. Life happens in the kitchen.
quotes.author: Andrew Zimmern

quotes.quote: Cooking is one of the strongest ceremonies for life.
quotes.author: Laura Esquivel

quotes.quote: The kitchen is a place of adventure and entirely fun, not drudgery. I can’t think of anything better to do with family and friends than to be together to create something.
quotes.author: Ted Allen

quotes.quote: The kitchen is where we come to understand our past and ourselves.
quotes.author: Emma Reed

quotes.quote: Kitchens are made for bringing families together.
quotes.author: Emma Reed

quotes.quote: The love the whole process of making them, just out in the kitchen together making pancakes on a Sunday morning.
quotes.author: Ronda Rousey

quotes.quote: Good food and a warm kitchen is what makes a house a home.
quotes.author: RACHAEL RAY

quotes.quote: They say the way to our hearts is through our stomachs, so the kitchen must be the heart of the home
quotes.author: Emma Reed

quotes.quote: There are times when wisdom cannot be found in the chambers of parliament or the halls of academia but at the unpretentious setting of the kitchen table.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: In the 'kitchen of your life', you have a choice as to what ingredients you want to use to build yourself up.
quotes.author: Selorm Betepe Alfred

quotes.quote: Despite a few exceptions, I have found that Americans are now far more willing to learn new names, just as they're far more willing to try new ethnic foods... It's like adding a few new spices to the kitchen pantry.
quotes.author: Firoozeh Dumas

quotes.quote: The sight of iniquity, immorality, pure evil, perhaps the world's end; a kitchen in disorder.
quotes.author: Kate Quinn

quotes.quote: My happy place is you teaching me how to dance in the kitchen at two in the morning.
quotes.author: Lidia Longorio

quotes.quote: Nights alone in my yellow kitchen, I made myself hot chocolate. I missed my mother. In my window, maple leaves rusted, young fall blooming.
quotes.author: Aspen Matis

quotes.quote: Over the years, the kitchens I grew up in and around continued to draw me in, like a moth to a flame, as though I might recapture whatever innocence I’d lost in that warm, fragrant space.
quotes.author: Sasha Martin

quotes.quote: Even the most avid technocrat must occasionally escape from virtual space, and what better place to do it than the kitchen, with all its dangerous knives and delicious aromas?
quotes.author: Ruth Reichl

quotes.quote: An idealist is one who, on noticing that a rose smells better than a cabbage, concludes that it makes a better soup.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Mostly it is loss which teaches us about the worth of things.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: There is no spectacle on earth more appealing than that of a beautiful woman in the act of cooking dinner for someone she loves.
quotes.author: Thomas Wolfe

quotes.quote: No one who cooks, cooks alone. Even at her most solitary, a cook in the kitchen is surrounded by generations of cooks past, the advice and menus of cooks present, the wisdom of cookbook writers.
quotes.author: Laurie Colwin

quotes.quote: Always start out with a larger pot than what you think you need.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: No one is born a great cook, one learns by doing.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: Cooking is at once child's play and adult joy. And cooking done with care is an act of love.
quotes.author: Craig Claiborne

quotes.quote: Until I discovered cooking, I was never really interested in anything.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: I think preparing food and feeding people brings nourishment not only to our bodies but to our spirits. Feeding people is a way of loving them, in the same way that feeding ourselves is a way of honoring our own createdness and fragility.
quotes.author: Shauna Niequist

quotes.quote: The kitchen may be the heart of the home, but it is also the place that naturally attracts the most clutter and mess.
quotes.author: Brette Sember

quotes.quote: My favorite room in the house is my kitchen. It's definitely the heart and soul of our home. It's where we gather in the morning as a family to start the day, and it's where we wind down at night over supper.
quotes.author: Kimberly Schlapman

quotes.quote: In the childhood memories of every good cook, there's a large kitchen, a warm stove, a simmering pot and a mom.
quotes.author: Barbara Costikyan

quotes.quote: A kitchen without a knife is not a kitchen.
quotes.author: Masaharu Morimoto

quotes.quote: The worst mistake of a woman is to go to the kitchen, because then she never gets out of there.
quotes.author: Shakira

quotes.quote: There is a peculiar burning odor in the room, like explosives. the kitchen fills with smoke and the hot, sweet, ashy smell of scorched cookies. The war has begun.
quotes.author: Alison Lurie

quotes.quote: The kitchen, reasonably enough, was the scene of my first gastronomic adventure. I was on all fours. I crawled into the vegetable bin, settled on a giant onion and ate it, skin and all. It must have marked me for life, for I have never ceased to love the hearty flavor of raw onions.
quotes.author: James Beard

quotes.quote: A kitchen is a good place to be, almost always the best place in the house.
quotes.author: Michael Ruhlman

quotes.quote: Happiness is a small house, with a big kitchen.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: Kitchens are hard environments and they form incredibly strong characters.
quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

quotes.quote: The kitchen may not get cleaned, and I have to accept that. I do the important things.
quotes.author: Jasmine Guy

quotes.quote: When you're the conscious captain in your kitchen, you'll feel better mentally and physically.
quotes.author: Kris Carr

quotes.quote: If you can organize your kitchen, you can organize your life.
quotes.author: Louis Parrish

quotes.quote: I like to have friends in the kitchen and make a big mess and use every pot in the kitchen.
quotes.author: Ted Allen

quotes.quote: Afterwards, they always had tea in the kitchen, much the nicest room in the house.
quotes.author: Flora Thompson

quotes.quote: Best way to get rid of kitchen odors: Eat out.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: It's like a kitchen, acting. Put a chef in a kitchen and they will have different recipes. Whatever your recipe, what works for you won't work for another.
quotes.author: Carole Bouquet

quotes.quote: The kitchen is the most important place in any house. Visit your family, and that's where you'll end up. Go to a party, that's where everyone congregates.
quotes.author: Michelle Dockery

quotes.quote: There is nothing nicer than a kitchen really made for a cook. Things that are designed to be used always have an innate beauty.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: Their kitchen is their shrine, the cook their priest, the table their altar, and their belly their god.
quotes.author: Charles Buck

quotes.quote: The kitchen is a place I know well. It's my favorite room wherever I am living, and it has to be completely open and social.
quotes.author: Chrissy Teigen

quotes.quote: Our kitchen is a kitchen that makes food designed to be tasted with the five senses and it requires concentration to appreciate all that we want to express.
quotes.author: Ferran Adria

quotes.quote: When she goes about her kitchen duties, chopping, carving, mixing, whisking, she moves with the grace and precision of a ballet dancer, her fingers plying the food with the dexterity of a croupier.
quotes.author: Craig Claiborne

quotes.quote: The more you know, the more you can create. There's no end to imagination in the kitchen.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: If you let too many cooks in the kitchen it could cloud your vision of what you want to do.
quotes.author: Mary Elizabeth Winstead

quotes.quote: I'm in a loft and the kitchen is in the very center of the apartment. The whole place revolves around it.
quotes.author: Ted Allen

quotes.quote: The kitchen is the heart of every home, for the most part. It evokes memories of your family history.
quotes.author: Debi Mazar

quotes.quote: The kitchen really is the castle itself. This is where we spend our happiest moments and where we find the joy of being a family.
quotes.author: Mario Batali

quotes.quote: Anyone that's ever had their kitchen done over knows that it never gets done as soon as you wish it would.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: The place I like best in this world is the kitchen. No matter where it is, no matter what kind, if it's a kitchen, if it's a place where they make food, it's fine with me. Ideally it should be well broken in. Lots of tea towels, dry and immaculate. Where tile catching the light (ting! Ting!)
quotes.author: Banana Yoshimoto

quotes.quote: My worst habit in the kitchen is not allowing anybody to help me. I like to cook by myself.
quotes.author: Eva Longoria

quotes.quote: The Kitchen was a really great concept; it just wasn't at the price point that made it accessible to people. People could visit occasionally, and some people were coming regularly. It just wasn't a novel concept for every customer.
quotes.author: Kimbal Musk

quotes.quote: My kitchen is a mystical place, a kind of temple for me. It is a place where the surfaces seem to have significance, where the sounds and odors carry meaning that transfers from the past and bridges to the future.
quotes.author: Pearl Bailey

quotes.quote: Good kitchens are not about size; they are about ergonomics and light.
quotes.author: Nigel Slater

quotes.quote: The kitchen is where you put all the ingredients together. The kitchen is where you prepare the plan and put your recipe together. No matter what you do in life, you have to have a plan and put it together.
quotes.author: Yo Gotti

quotes.quote: The kitchen is a sacred space.
quotes.author: Marc Forgione

quotes.quote: Keep it simple in the kitchen. If you use quality ingredients, you don't need anything fancy to make food delicious: just a knife, a cutting board, and some good nonstick cookware, and you're set.
quotes.author: Curtis Stone

quotes.quote: To me, the kitchen is a place of adventure and entirely fun, not drudgery. I can't think of anything better to do with family and friends than to be together to create something.
quotes.author: Ted Allen

quotes.quote: If your kitchen smells good, your food lost something.
quotes.author: Nathan Myhrvold

quotes.quote: For me, a kitchen is like science fiction. I only go there to open the refrigerator and take something out.
quotes.author: Ann-Margret

quotes.quote: Kitchens should be designed around what's truly important-fun, food, and life.
quotes.author: Daniel Boulud

quotes.quote: The kitchen oven is reliable, but it's made us lazy.
quotes.author: Jamie Oliver

quotes.quote: Keeping kids safe is sometimes a delusion. The world is a perilous place. Sometimes the kitchen is a perilous place.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: The kitchen is the great laboratory of the household, and much of the 'weal and woe' as far as regards bodily health, depends on the nature of the preparations concocted within its walls.
quotes.author: Isabella Beeton

quotes.quote: Keep in mind that kitchen organization is not a one-shot deal. It's a lifestyle. You need to sustain it. It isn't just a matter of getting organized, but staying and thinking that way.
quotes.author: Brette Sember

quotes.quote: A messy kitchen is a happy kitchen, and this kitchen is delirious.
quotes.author: Tara McLellan

quotes.quote: A good kitchen should be sufficient remote from the principal apartment of the house, that the members, visitors, or guests of the family may not perceive the odour incident to cooking, or hear the noise of culinary operations.
quotes.author: Mrs. Isabella

quotes.quote: Perhaps the most important element in a small kitchen, as in any small living space, is storage-lack of storage, effective storage, and hidden storage.
quotes.author: Tara McLellan

quotes.quote: When I cook, I think about the people that I am cooking for, I think of the precious memories we have shared. I think of the love that I have for them and how they have blessed each seasons of my life.
quotes.author: Willie Holton Halbert

quotes.quote: I really believe that is why my family and friends enjoy my cooking because I cook with love.
quotes.author: Willie Holton Halbert

quotes.quote: Don't forget, as you cook, to let those precious memories of those who you are cooking for flow. Cooking with love has been a labor of love and joy! So enjoy.
quotes.author: Willie Holton Halbert

quotes.quote: My goal as a cook has always been not so much to attain some specific sense of mastery as to be able to just go into the kitchen, take up what I find there, and make a meal of it.
quotes.author: John Thorne

quotes.quote: In grandmamma's kitchen, things got in a riot / The cream in a pot on the shelf / Where everything always seemed peaceful and quiet / Got whipped, for I heard it myself.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: I do not ask for splendour / To crown my daily lot / But this I ask – a kitchen / Where the kettles always hot.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: When he got home the 'ouse were in dark ness / So he slipped in as sly as a fox / Laid the 'sparagus on kitchen table / And crept up to bed in his socks.
quotes.author: Marriott Edgar

quotes.quote: He shouted 'What's up theer in t' kitchen?' / She replied, 'You do well to enquire / Them bundles of chips as you brought home / Is so damp... I can't light the fire."
quotes.author: Marriott Edgar

quotes.quote: Oh, the irony of hearin' songs about the home, sweet home / When you swelter in an oven where the kitchen odours roam.
quotes.author: Clarence Michael James Stanislaus Dennis

quotes.quote: No kitchen my grate / Yet roasts it and boils it / Both early and late.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: I like my kitchen with its pans and pots / That shine like new although we've used them lots.
quotes.author: Lesbia Harford

quotes.quote: Everything is right at hand and money freely flows / And hired help is all about, just listenin’ to my call / But I miss the yellow almanac off my old kitchen wall.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: You have to run the kitchen, you can't let the kitchen run you.
quotes.author: Sharon Trojan

quotes.quote: All us other children, when the supper-things is done / We set around the kitchen fire an' has the mostest fun / A-list'nin' to the witch-tales 'at Annie tells about,
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote: If you decide to go through life without cooking, then you are missing something very, very special. You are losing out one of the greatest pleasures you can have with your clothes on.
quotes.author: Karen Anand

quotes.quote: A really posh kitchen, all metal. What happened to the doors, though? Did you run out of money?
quotes.author: Terry Nation

quotes.quote: Cooking can be passionate, creative, life enhancing, uplifting, satisfying and downright exhilarating as anything else you can do with you life
quotes.author: Karen Anad

quotes.quote: This is the kitchen. We've got all kinds of snacks and cold drinks in here.
quotes.author: Seth MacFarlane

quotes.quote: My kitchen is now a place of creativity and adventure, although I've had to learn the hard way which recipes work, which don't, and which taste awful.
quotes.author: Rachel Kelly

quotes.quote: I realized a joyful kitchen could calm me as much as the food itself.
quotes.author: Rachel Kelly

quotes.quote: There was no pressure to perform, just to find my feet in the kitchen
quotes.author: Rachel Kelly

quotes.quote: The kitchen is a very difficult place to keep clutter-free because it's filled with all the things you need for the smooth operation and functioning of your household.
quotes.author: Brette Sember

quotes.quote: The kitchen is the center of home life for many people, and this means that many kitchens are pulling double (or triple duty) as a home office, homework station, craft center, and more.
quotes.author: Brette Sember

quotes.quote: If you kitchen is out of balance, it's likely you are as well.
quotes.author: Brette Sember

quotes.quote: A cook, when I dine, seems to me a divine being, who from the depths of his kitchen rules the human race. One consider him as a minister of heaven, because his kitchen is a temple, in which his ovens are the altar.
quotes.author: Desaugiers

quotes.quote: I love even incredibly dirty kitchens to distraction--vegetable droppings all over the floor, so dirty your slippers turn black on the bottom.
quotes.author: Banana Yoshimoto

quotes.quote: Perhaps because to me a kitchen represents some distant longing engraved on my soul.
quotes.author: Banana Yoshimoto

quotes.quote: The commercial kitchen can be a hazardous work environment. Workplace safety cannot be ignored or passed over as someone else's responsibility.
quotes.author: Graham Dark

quotes.quote: A well-organized kitchen should have procedures in place to deal with all kinds of the emergencies.
quotes.author: Graham Dark

quotes.quote: You need to grab your dream out of the sky like it's a kite and pinch the string through your fingers until you reach the spool.
quotes.author: Augusten Burroughs

quotes.quote: A kite can't really fly free,that's just an expression. In order to soar high in the sky the string of a kite needs to be anchored. If the string breaks the kite drops back to the ground. The kite's freedom depends on it not being as free as he thinks it is.
quotes.author: Simon Napier-Bell

quotes.quote: Come up and be a kite, On a diamond flight!
quotes.author: Kate Bush

quotes.quote: Imagination is the highest kite that one can fly.
quotes.author: Lauren Bacall

quotes.quote: Strong people are made by opposition like kites that go up against the wind.
quotes.author: Frank Harris

quotes.quote: Imagination is the highest kite that can fly.
quotes.author: Lauren Bacall

quotes.quote: If the kite is set up properly it will shoot up into the sky.
quotes.author: Charlie Dunton

quotes.quote: When the wind is against you, like a kite, have your chord of faith rooted and you would fly highest ever.
quotes.author: Vikrmn

quotes.quote: Don't ignore the small things -- the kite flies because of its tail.
quotes.author: Anoymous

quotes.quote: A kite is a victim you are sure of. you love it because it pulls.
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.quote: Kites rise highest against the wind - not with it.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Kite has bought it and the price it was purchased for was not as competitive as what others might have paid for.
quotes.author: Greg Van Winkle

quotes.quote: You will find truth more quickly through delight than gravity. Let out a little more string on your kite.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: Like a kite Cut from the string, Lightly the soul of my youth Has taken flight.
quotes.author: Takuboku Ishikawa

quotes.quote: The optimist pleasantly ponders how high his kite will fly; the pessimist woefully wonders how soon his kite will fall.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: When the wind stops, kite falls but bird flies; because bird did not borrow the wind when rising!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Never fear opposition: A kite rises highest when it goes against the wind.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid of opposition. Remember, a kite rises against, not with, the wind.
quotes.author: Hamilton Wright Mabie

quotes.quote: True courage is like a kite; a contrary wind raises it higher.
quotes.author: John Petit-Senn

quotes.quote: A certain amount of opposition is a great help to a man. Kites rise against, not with, the wind.
quotes.author: Lewis Mumford

quotes.quote: Let the kite perch and let the eagle perch too. If one says no to the other, let his wing break.
quotes.author: Chinua Achebe

quotes.quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: It can't be all you. Just like you need air to fly a kite. It's not the kite. It's the air.
quotes.author: Pharrell Williams

quotes.quote: Life is much like flying a Kite, you never know what direction the wind is going to blow and how many twists and turns there will be before the flight is over!
quotes.author: Eric T. Paulsen

quotes.quote: Art is like a kite. You have to pull the string hard in order to stretch it to its limit, but you don't want to pull it so hard that you break the thread, because the thread connects you to the land and its peoples.
quotes.author: Wu Guanzhong

quotes.quote: A kite only flies if it's tethered.
quotes.author: Victor Robert Lee

quotes.quote: A kite flies even higher with strong adverse wind. So don't despair, enjoy flying your kite whilst the wind blows.
quotes.author: Mufti Ismail Menk

quotes.quote: A kite can be flown in an absolute vacuum if it can be towed at the speed of light.
quotes.author: Randall Dale Adams

quotes.quote: A kite flies against the wind, not with it.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: Don't ignore the small things, the kite flies because of its tail.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A kitten gets himself into every kind of trouble.
quotes.author: Champfleury

quotes.quote: A kitten is in the animal world what a rosebud is in the garden.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: Gather kittens while you may, Time brings only sorrow; And the kittens of today; Will be old cats tomorrow.
quotes.author: Oliver Herford

quotes.quote: Do you see that kitten chasing so prettily her own tail? If you could look with her eyes, you might see her surrounded with hundreds of figures performing complex dramas, with tragic and comic issues, long conversations, many characters, many ups and downs of fate.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Even a heart of a kitten is reliable, if you know how to rely on.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: What feeling is so nice as a child's hand in yours? So small, so soft and warm, like a kitten huddling in the shelter of your clasp.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: Kittens believe that all nature is occupied with their diversion.
quotes.author: F.A. Paradis de Moncrif

quotes.quote: Kitten, four hours of sleep while holding you is far more beneficial to me than eight hours of endless tossing and turning because you're not there.
quotes.author: Jeaniene Frost

quotes.quote: Always enter like a kitten and leave like a lion. But never enter like a lion and leave like a kitten. Always be humble
quotes.author: Carlson Gracie

quotes.quote: Kittens will make your sad go away.
quotes.author: David Wong

quotes.quote: No matter how much the cats fight, there always seem to be plenty of kittens.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Once you get a kitten, the natural thing you do is take a billion photos.
quotes.author: Hannah Simone

quotes.quote: Poems are soft kitten furs. smoothing out the rough edges of my world.
quotes.author: Sanober Khan

quotes.quote: One thing was certain, that the white kitten had had nothing to do with it- it was the black kitten's fault entirely.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: A kitten is the delight of a household. All day long a comedy is played out by an incomparable actor.
quotes.author: Champfleury

quotes.quote: A kitten is the most irresistible comedian in the world. Its wide-open eyes gleam with wonder and mirth. It darts madly at nothing at all, and then, as though suddenly checked in the pursuit, prances sideways on its hind legs with ridiculous agility and zeal.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: Just like a kitten that thinks its a tiger.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.quote: No man can tame a tiger into a kitten by stroking it.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The playful kitten, with its pretty little tigerish gambols, is infinitely more amusing than half the people one is obliged to live with in the world.
quotes.author: Sydney, Lady Morgan

quotes.quote: The trouble with a kitten is that it eventually beomes a cat.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: A kitten is chiefly remarkable for rushing about like mad at nothing whatever and generally stopping before it gets there.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: Whiskers and tails and thousands of frails lion like nose with an angelesque pose silky pattern'd fur o'er heart touching purr.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: A kitten is so flexible that she is almost double; the hind parts are equivalent to another kitten with which the forepart plays. She does not discover that her tail belongs to her until you tread on it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: It is impossible to keep a straight face in the presence of one or more kittens.
quotes.author: Cynthia E. Varnado

quotes.quote: But there was a kitten on my pillow, and it was purring in my face and vibrating gently with every purr, and, very soon, I slept.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Kittens are born with their eyes shut. They open them in about six days, take a look around, then close them again for the better part of their lives.
quotes.author: Stephen Baker

quotes.quote: Prowling his own quiet backyard or asleep by the fire, he is still only a whisker away from the wilds.
quotes.author: Jean Burden

quotes.quote: Kittens are wide-eyed, soft and sweet. With needles in their jaws and feet.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: A kitten is chiefly remarkable for rushing about like mad at nothing whatever, and generally stopping before it gets there.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: The only thing a cat worries about is what's happening right now. As we tell the kittens, you can only wash one paw at a time.
quotes.author: Lloyd Alexander

quotes.quote: The smallest feline is a masterpiece.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Kittens, kittens, showers of kittens, visitations of kittens. So many, you see them as Kitten, like leaves growing on a bare branch, staying heavy and green, then falling, exactly the same every year. People coming to visit say: What happened to that lovely kitten? What lovely kitten? They are all lovely kittens.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: You cannot rob robbers with a kitten in your hat!
quotes.author: Diana Wynne Jones

quotes.quote: But buds will be roses, and kittens, cats - more's the pity.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: We quickly discovered that two kittens were much more fun than one.
quotes.author: Allen Lacy

quotes.quote: I have just been given a very engaging Persian kitten... and his opinion is that I have been given to him.
quotes.author: Evelyn Underhill

quotes.quote: Every natural movement is graceful. Did you ever watch a kitten at play?
quotes.author: Anna Cora Mowatt

quotes.quote: She, that will with kittens jest, should bear a kitten's joke.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: It's more blessed to give than to receive - especially kittens.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Kittens play with yarn, they bat it around. What they're really doing is saying, "I can't knit, get this away from me!"
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: Another cat? Perhaps. For love there is also a season; its seeds must be resown. But a family of cat is not replaceable like a worn-out coat or a set of tires. Each new kitten becomes its own cat, and none is repeated. I am four cats old, measuring out my life in friends that have succeeded but not replaced one another.
quotes.author: Irving Townsend

quotes.quote: There is no more intrepid explorer than a kitten.
quotes.author: Jules Champfleury

quotes.quote: If only cats grew into kittens.
quotes.author: Robert A. M. Stern

quotes.quote: Twenty-seven cats at one time hints at monomania, but in my case it was simpler. If you like cats and have some, you get kittens; and if you like kittens and enjoy having them about, they grow up and beget more cats for you.
quotes.author: Paul Gallico

quotes.quote: Tall, dark, and handsome was hot. Tall, dark, and handsome with a nestled kitten? Atomic.
quotes.author: Chloe Neill

quotes.quote: It is a very inconvenient habit of kittens (Alice had once made the remark) that whatever you say to them, they always purr.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: The kitten was six weeks old. It was enchanting, a delicate fairy-tale cat, whose Siamese genes showed in the shape of the face, ears, tail, and the subtle lines of its body. She sat, a tiny thing, in the middle of a yellow carpet, surrounded by five worshippers, not at all afraid of us. Then she stalked around that floor of the house, inspecting every inch of it, climbed up on to my bed, crept under the fold of a sheet, and was at home.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: One day on opening the shutters of your house, intrigued by cries you hear deep in your garden, you go out to find the origin of them and there under the pile of wood, you are face to face with a small frightened hairball : a kitten.
quotes.author: Pierre-Yves Dumoulin

quotes.quote: Confront a child, a puppy, and a kitten with a sudden danger; the child will turn instinctively for assistance, the puppy will grovel in abject submission, the kitten will brace its tiny body for frantic resistance.
quotes.author: Saki

quotes.quote: An ordinary kitten will ask more questions than any five-year old.
quotes.author: Carl Van Vechten

quotes.quote: The kitten has a luxurious, Bohemian, unpuritanical nature. It eats six meals a day, plays furiously with a toy mouse and a piece of rope, and suddenly falls into a deep sleep whenever the fit takes it. It never feels the necessity to do anything to justify its existence; it does not want to be a Good Citizen; it has never heard of Service. It knows that it is beautiful and delightful, and it considers that a sufficient contribution to the general good. And in return for its beauty and charm it expects fish, meat, and vegetables, a comfortable bed, a chair by the grate fire, and endless petting.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: Kitten, my kitten, soft and dear, / I am so glad that we are here / Sitting together just us two, / You loving me and me loving you.
quotes.author: Marchette Chute

quotes.quote: I named my kitten Rose - fur soft as a petal, claws sharper than thorns.
quotes.author: Astrid Alauda

quotes.quote: Never pick up a stray kitten... unless you've already made up your mind to be owned by it.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: All kittens are cute until they grow up and become ugly.
quotes.author: Jim Davies

quotes.quote: Wanton kittens make sober cats.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: All kittens, from the very first, set out to teach their humans to adapt to the needs of a cat. As a reward, they grant them the position of honorary cat.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: Kittens are angels with whiskers.
quotes.author: Alexis Flora Hope
