quotes.quote: I throw drafts away all the time and I wish more people did... If you have a kitten, they love playing with rolled-up balls of paper, and that may be all a failed draft is good for. Why make a reader unhappy when you can make a kitten happy?
quotes.author: Billy Collins

quotes.quote: A house is never perfectly furnished for enjoyment unless there is a child in it rising three years old, and a kitten of six weeks.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: A cat has absolute emotional honesty: human beings, for one reason or another, may hide their feelings, but a cat does not.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: A cat's idea of a 'good time' is to kill something.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: The cat does not offer services. The cat offers itself. Of course he wants care and shelter. You don't buy love for nothing.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: A little drowsing cat is an image of perfect beatitude.
quotes.author: Champfleury

quotes.quote: No cat out of its first fur can ever be deceived by appearances. Unlike human beings, who enjoy them.
quotes.author: Peter S. Beagle

quotes.quote: A well-trained cat doesn't exist because a cat remains a cat.
quotes.author: Marjane Satrapi

quotes.quote: The cat is cryptic, and close to strange things which men cannot see.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: Any cat that misses a mouse pretends it was aiming for the dead leaf.
quotes.author: Charlotte Gray

quotes.quote: A cat understands how to be pleasant in the morning. He doesn't talk.
quotes.author: Tamora Pierce

quotes.quote: God made the cat to give man the pleasure of stroking a tiger
quotes.author: Francois Joseph Mery

quotes.quote: A cat is more intelligent than people believe, and can be taught any crime.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A cat cares for you only as a source of food, security and a place in the sun.
quotes.author: Charles Horton Cooley

quotes.quote: If you hold a cat by the tail you learn things you cannot learn any other way.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The cat has complete emotional honesty – an attribute not often found in humans.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: The cat could very well be man's best friend but would never stoop to admitting it.
quotes.author: Douglas Larson

quotes.quote: If you are worthy of its affection, a cat will be your friend but never your slave.
quotes.author: Theophile Gautier

quotes.quote: The cat is, above all things, a dramatist.
quotes.author: Margaret Benson

quotes.quote: A cat is a puzzle for which there is no solution.
quotes.author: Hazel Nicholson

quotes.quote: In a cat's eye, all things belong to cats.
quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

quotes.quote: The cat always leaves a mark on his friend.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: A cat will never drown if she sees the shore.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Every cat knows some things need to be buried.
quotes.author: Ruth Graham

quotes.quote: A cat is a cat. She has no race creed or collar.
quotes.author: Eartha Kitt

quotes.quote: No cat purrs unless someone is around to listen.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Marshall Thomas

quotes.quote: A cat is only technically an animal, being divine.
quotes.author: Robert Lynd

quotes.quote: Cat angels are the reason there are no mice angels.
quotes.author: Mel Brooks

quotes.quote: A cat doesn't linger over making it's desires felt.
quotes.author: Paul Gallico

quotes.quote: Wherever a cat sits, there shall happiness be found.
quotes.author: Stanley Spencer

quotes.quote: If a woman has one cat, it will invariably turn into 20.
quotes.author: Greg Kinnear

quotes.quote: A cat is never a presentation, but an innocent happening.
quotes.author: Alwin Nikolais

quotes.quote: Every cat is really the most beautiful woman in the room.
quotes.author: E. V. Lucas

quotes.quote: The cat is a wild animal that inhabits the homes of humans.
quotes.author: Konrad Lorenz

quotes.quote: Cat's eyes seem a bridge to a world beyond the one we know.
quotes.author: Lynn-Holly Johnson

quotes.quote: A cat who turns her nose up at bread does not deserve meat.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The cat dwells within the circle of her own secret thoughts.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: Black cat or white cat: If it can catch mice, it's a good cat.
quotes.author: Deng Xiaoping

quotes.quote: A cat can never be well-trained because they're too independent.
quotes.author: Marjane Satrapi

quotes.quote: The only true animal is a cat, and the only true cat is a gray cat.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: A cat has to be in a very bad mood if a human cannot coax him to purr.
quotes.author: Derek Tangye

quotes.quote: The clever cat eats cheese and breathes down rat holes with baited breath.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: A cat improves the garden wall in sunshine, and the hearth in foul weather.
quotes.author: Judith Merkle Riley

quotes.quote: A cat pours his body on the floor like water. It is restful just to see him.
quotes.author: William Lyon Phelps

quotes.quote: A black cat crossing your path signifies that the animal is going somewhere.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: The main difference between a cat and a lie is that a cat only has nine lives.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The cat makes himself the companion of your hours of solitude, melancholy and toil.
quotes.author: Theophile Gautier

quotes.quote: Each cat has a distinct purrsonality.
quotes.author: Richard L. Peterson

quotes.quote: Cat lovers know that every cat is remarkable.
quotes.author: Gladys Taber

quotes.quote: The cat would eat fish but would not get her feet wet.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quotes.quote: The best model of a cat is another cat..., specially the same cat.
quotes.author: Arturo Rosenblueth

quotes.quote: It's only knitting and it's one of the few times in your life when there are no bad consequences to a mistake.
quotes.author: Stephanie Pearl-McPhee

quotes.quote: Maybe knitting is like writing a story-- an act of discovery. But that seems unlikely, given the very precise directions.
quotes.author: Ann Hood

quotes.quote: Knitting has a profound connective power. The culture and people and rituals around it, the values, they all contribute to an immediate and profound trust in one another. It's home. You belong and are accepted, which rings true no matter where you are.
quotes.author: Clara Parkes

quotes.quote: Knitting is very conducive to thought. It is nice to knit a while, put down the needles, write a while, then take up the sock again.
quotes.author: Dorothy Day

quotes.quote: Knitting not only relaxes me, it also brings a feeling of being at home.
quotes.author: Magdalena Neuner

quotes.quote: Properly practiced, knitting soothes the troubled spirit, and it doesn't hurt the untroubled spirit either.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Zimmermann

quotes.quote: When you are knitting socks and sweaters and scarves, you aren't just knitting. You are assigning a value to human effort. You are holding back time. You are preserving the simple unchanging act of handwork.
quotes.author: Stephanie Pearl-McPhee

quotes.quote: Knitting is a boon for those of us who are easily bored. I take my knitting everywhere to take the edge off of moments that would otherwise drive me stark raving mad.
quotes.author: Stephanie Pearl-McPhee

quotes.quote: Knitting, he thought, was a comfort to the soul.
quotes.author: Jan Karon

quotes.quote: You don't knit because you are patient. You are patient because you knit.
quotes.author: Stephanie Pearl-McPhee

quotes.quote: Knitting keeps me from stabbing people.
quotes.author: Jennie Breeden

quotes.quote: I love the way knitting brings people together.
quotes.author: Debbie Macomber

quotes.quote: All knitting is choreography.
quotes.author: Clara Parkes

quotes.quote: If you have time to knit, if you've taken up knitting, it means you're not worried about the essential stuff.
quotes.author: Stephanie Pearl-McPhee

quotes.quote: Knitting is formed by a series of loops pulled through loops to the end of time or to 'desired length'. By picking up loops and working in the opposite direction you are really picking up the concavities between the loops, and it is sheer unexpected witchcraft that stocking stitch and garter stitch will permit such an anomaly. Be grateful for this and don't expect anymore.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Zimmermann

quotes.quote: Stick to your knitting (what you're good at), don't compromise, and don't suffer fools.
quotes.author: Simon Campbell

quotes.quote: Wise men learn by others' harms; fools by their own.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A day of travelling will bring a basketful of learning.
quotes.author: Vietnamese (on journeys)

quotes.quote: Brains are better than brawn.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Everyone is ignorant only on different subjects.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Instead of seeking new landscapes, develop new eyes.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Knowledge is more than equivalent to force.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Learning is better than house and land.
quotes.author: David Garrick

quotes.quote: People learn more on their own rather than being force fed.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Presumption first blinds a man, then sets him a running.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The shoe knows if the stocking has a hole.
quotes.author: Bahamian (on knowledge and justice)

quotes.quote: What signifies knowing the names, if you know not the natures of things.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: When the pupil is ready, the teacher will come.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Wit is the only wall between us and the dark.
quotes.author: Mark Van Doren

quotes.quote: With time even a bear can learn to dance.
quotes.author: Yiddish (on education)

quotes.quote: Distance lends enchantment to the view.
quotes.author: Thomas Campbell

quotes.quote: Doubt is the key to knowledge.
quotes.author: Iranian (on education)

quotes.quote: Example is the best precept.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: It is better to be born a beggar than a fool.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: It is better to be the head of a chicken than the rear of an ox.
quotes.author: Japanese (on relative worth)

quotes.quote: Knowledge is power.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Mistakes are doorways to discovery.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Put two and two together.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: What good is running when you're on the wrong road.
quotes.author: German (on planning)

quotes.quote: When you're sad, learn something,
quotes.author: Merlin

quotes.quote: Does koala bear poop smell like cough drops?
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: In Australia, a land so dry and arid, Koalas live in trees by day in order to bear it.
quotes.author: C.D. Roberts

quotes.quote: The naïve tend to think that, by feeding a snake, it will turn into a koala one day.
quotes.author: Robin Sacredfire

quotes.quote: Our slow moving koala is a triumph of evolution, able to survive and thrive on a diet of gum leaves, not the most nutritious plants. Its solution to the problem of handling such food made the koala a success story of the Australian forests.
quotes.author: Stephen Jackson

quotes.quote: If you would be gay and free, take my tip and live in a tree.
quotes.author: Norman Lindsay

quotes.quote: The koala thinks the day is for sleeping; the night for living.
quotes.author: Thomas Wood

quotes.quote: We have simultaneously raised the koala up high in our estimation and lowered its chance of survival…Ours is a love-hate relationship of far-reaching consequences.
quotes.author: Ann Sharp

quotes.quote: It is one of the most extraordinary occurrences in the whole story of natural history that such a most peculiar animal should have received no scientific name for eight years after its first record.
quotes.author: Tom Iredale

quotes.quote: It stands quite alone the solitary species of its genus.
quotes.author: John Gould

quotes.quote: Eat away, chew away, munch and bolt and guzzle. Never leave the table till you’re full up to the muzzle.
quotes.author: Norman Lindsay

quotes.quote: I did find out about the koalas and how eucalyptus makes them high and why they sleep all day. They're little druggies.
quotes.author: Kristen Bell

quotes.quote: I hate having long hair. It's like walking around with a dead koala on your back!
quotes.author: Russell Crowe

quotes.quote: My favourite animal is the koala, but his life would be boring. I would rather be a giraffe so that I could contemplate the beauty of Africa.
quotes.author: Caterina Murino

quotes.quote: I'd love to hold a koala. They sleep 22 hours a day, eat eucalyptus leaves and just hang out. I want to spend some time with that guy.
quotes.author: Milo Ventimiglia

quotes.quote: There is no pleasing you! And koalas and otters don't even live near each other!
quotes.author: Chuck Lorre

quotes.quote: The koala. Its adorable appearance belies a vile temperament.
quotes.author: Christopher Markus

quotes.quote: I can be faulted for being overly fond of koala bears. I don't know what it is. When they start munching on eucalyptus, I just melt inside.
quotes.author: Chuck Lorre

quotes.quote: My little koala type bear / Little koala type bear / I can see you sitting there / With your silent smile.
quotes.author: Paul Mccartney

quotes.quote: Koala' in one tribal language also meant 'no water', a pertinent name for an animal that rarely drinks.
quotes.author: Ann Mozley Moyal

quotes.quote: The koala feed upon the tender the tender shoots of the bubble gum tree, being more particularly fond of this of any other food; it rests during the day on the tops og these trees, feeding at its ease, or sleeping.
quotes.author: Ann Mozley Moyal

quotes.quote: Koalas are mammals. Mammals are warm-blooded animals.
quotes.author: Bobbie Kalman

quotes.quote: A marsupial baby is different from other mammal babies. It grows inside its mother's body for only a short time. The tiny baby then moves to a pouch on its mother's abdomen, where it drinks milk and finishes growing.
quotes.author: Bobbie Kalman

quotes.quote: The koala is fully grown at the age of one year, but is is still young and stays with its mother.
quotes.author: Bobbie Kalman

quotes.quote: People use eucalyptus wood to make railroad ties and build ships. The koala's long arms are just for these tall trees. Because they climb so well, koalas are sometimes called 'monkey bears.
quotes.author: Diana Star Helmer

quotes.quote: Like monkeys, koalas have five fingers on each hand. These claws are long. They make climbing and leaping from branch to branch very easy for koalas.
quotes.author: Diana Star Helmer

quotes.quote: Koalas are nocturnal animals, which means that they are more active at night than during the day. Even so, a koala spends most of its life--day and night--asleep.
quotes.author: Caroline Arnold

quotes.quote: When it is rainy or cold, a koala does not have to seek shelter. Its thick fur is waterproof and provides plenty of warmth. During hot weather, it sheds some of its fur.
quotes.author: Caroline Arnold

quotes.quote: When it comes to food koalas are very fussy eaters.
quotes.author: Jan Latta

quotes.quote: Our slow koala is a triumph of evolution, able to survive and thrive on a diet of gum leaves, not the most nutritious plants. Its solution to the problem of handling such food made the koala a success story of the Australian forests.
quotes.author: Stephen Jackson

quotes.quote: The koala is the largest arboreal, or tree-climbing, mammal on the island continent if Australia. It is instantly recognisable by its short, stocky build, lack of tail, large fluffy ears and spoon-shaped nose.
quotes.author: Stephen Jackson

quotes.quote: The koala can vary considerable in size and colour throughout its distribution.
quotes.author: Stephen Jackson

quotes.quote: Koalas are marsupials. A marsupial mother has a pouch on her belly. Her baby lives and grows in it.
quotes.author: Susan H. Gray

quotes.quote: At birht, a baby koala cannot hear and its eyes are closed. But is has strong arms. It can crawl into its mother's pouch to sleep.
quotes.author: Susan H. Gray

quotes.quote: If a koala feels threatened, it will bite its enemy. It will bite on the same spot many times. The koala can do quite of damage doing this.
quotes.author: Sharon Greenaway

quotes.quote: Koala do not like to scratch their enemy. Their claws are mostly used just for climbing.
quotes.author: Sharon Greenaway

quotes.quote: Tree clearing and logging by humans is also a threat. We take logs to build houses. The land is also cleared for farms. This means the koala has no more place to live.
quotes.author: Sharon Greenaway

quotes.quote: Koalas spend most of their time in eucalyptus trees. They eat almost nothing except eucalyptus leaves, back, and fruit. A koala has many adaptations that help it live this unusual life.
quotes.author: Mary King Hoff

quotes.quote: A koalas eyes's are in front of their heads, rather than on the sides. This helps them judge how far away something is--a valuable skill when living above the ground!
quotes.author: Mary King Hoff

quotes.quote: Koalas have a good sense of smell. They use it to choose the best eucalyptus leaves to eat.
quotes.author: Mary King Hoff

quotes.quote: Koalas may look like little bears. But they belong to the marsupial family. Kangaroos are marsupials too.
quotes.author: Grace Hansen

quotes.quote: Eventually the Korean War will be understood as one of the most destructive and one of the most important wars of the twentieth century.
quotes.author: Bruce Cumings

quotes.quote: The Korean War has also shown quite clearly that in a major conflict manpower is as important as horsepower.
quotes.author: Aly Khan

quotes.quote: As a Korean War veteran, I know firsthand and understand the sacrifices made by our men and women in uniform.
quotes.author: Charles B. Rangel

quotes.quote: As a Korean War Veteran, I know too well the troubling nature of war. This is why I will always support a diplomatic answer before military intervention.
quotes.author: Charles B. Rangel

quotes.quote: Too young for Korea, too old for Vietnam.
quotes.author: Don DeLillo

quotes.quote: I will defend Korea as I would my own country-just as I would California.
quotes.author: General Douglas MacArthur

quotes.quote: As a child growing up during the Korean War, I knew poverty. I studied by candlelight.
quotes.author: Lee Myung-bak

quotes.quote: The Korean war has always been an unpopular war among the American people.
quotes.author: Paul Robeson

quotes.quote: Those who suffer terrible wars have a finer sense of when they begin and when they end.
quotes.author: Bruce Cumings

quotes.quote: I wanted to write about the Korean War, but I had no entry into it that made the kind of sense it needs to make for a novelist.
quotes.author: Chang-Rae Lee

quotes.quote: Fear was the terrible secret of the battlefiled and could afflict the brave as well as the timid. Worse it was contagious, and could destroy a unit before a battle even began. Because of that, commanders were first and foremost in the fear suppression business.
quotes.author: David Halberstam

quotes.quote: I'd always wanted to write something about the Korean War because of my heritage. My father lost his brother during the war, and I fictionalized that episode, which was told to me very briefly without much detail.
quotes.author: Chang-Rae Lee

quotes.quote: Past records of inter-Korean relations show that confrontation between fellow countrymen leads to nothing but war.
quotes.author: Kim Jong-un

quotes.quote: I was gripped with a sense of unreality that followed me through most of the war. Reality, I guess, is just what we are accustomed to.
quotes.author: Marguerite Higgins

quotes.quote: A military situation at its worst can inspire fighting men to perform at their best.
quotes.author: Marguerite Higgins

quotes.quote: It comes down to this: we're pieces of equipment To be counted and signed for. On occasion some of us break down, And those parts which can't be salvaged Are replaced with other GI parts, that's all.
quotes.author: Rolando Hinojosa

quotes.quote: South Korea first allowed women into the military in 1950 during the Korean War. Back then, female soldiers mainly held administrative and support positions. Women began to take on combat roles in the 1990s when the three military academies, exclusive to men, began accepting women.
quotes.author: Kim Young-ha

quotes.quote: They keep us so hungry that we can't do anything but worry about where our next meal is coming from. They keep us hungry for so long that we are grateful for whatever little food we get.
quotes.author: Sook Nyul Choi

quotes.quote: Kung fu. It means, “supreme skill from hard work.” A great poet has reached kung fu. The painter, the calligrapher, they can be said to have kung fu. Even the cook, the one who sweeps steps or a masterful servant can have kung fu. Practice. Preparation. Endless repetition. Until your mind is weary, and your bones ache. Until you’re too tired to sweat, too wasted to breathe. That is the way, the only way one acquires kung fu.
quotes.author: Marco Polo

quotes.quote: A kung fu man lives without being dependant on the opinions of others, and a master, unlike the beginner, holds himself in reserve. He is quiet and unassuming, with no desire to show off.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Learning Kung fu has only one purpose: To train one's reaction into a natural response. Such reaction is essential.
quotes.author: Master Yuan Xiu Gang

quotes.quote: The Chinese words ‘kung fu’ translate more or less as ‘a man hard at work over a long time’. If you want to unlock the full power of kung fu, it is not going to be easy: you are going to have to work, you are going to have to sacrifice and you are going to have to suffer – over a long time. There really is no such thing as a free lunch.
quotes.author: Master Iain Armstrong

quotes.quote: A Kung Fu Master is a Practitioner of Martial Arts Who Keeps Practicing.
quotes.author: Kailin Gow

quotes.quote: Use your martial skill for the good of humanity.
quotes.author: Ip man

quotes.quote: Exchanging blows generously, which is not uncommon in some other martial arts, is unthinkable in Shaolin philosophy, because a Shaolin disciple always assumes that an opponent is competent and able to inflict damage with just one blow.
quotes.author: WONG KIEW KIT

quotes.quote: I want to build up my philosophy... my philosophy with kung fu is to respect people.
quotes.author: Jackie Chan

quotes.quote: Kung fu lives in everything we do. It lives in how we put on a jacket and how we take off a jacket. It lives in how we treat people. Everything is kung fu.
quotes.author: Jackie Chan

quotes.quote: Legend tells of a legendary warrior whose kung fu skills were the stuff of legend.
quotes.author: Kung Fu Panda

quotes.quote: The old Oriental shamans had a much different view when they recalled the movements of kung fu.
quotes.author: Lujan Matus

quotes.quote: You can use martial arts to tell a different story. Ang Lee used martial arts in 'Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon' to talk about love.
quotes.author: Jet Li

quotes.quote: To me, the extraordinary aspect of martial arts lies in its simplicity. The easy way is also the right way, and martial arts is nothing at all special; the closer to the true way of martial arts, the less wastage of expression there is.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Martial arts is not about fighting, it is about being fit and healthy, both physiologically and psychologically.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: The best form of self defense is to become invisible... If you can't do that learn Wing Chun!
quotes.author: Wong Shun Leung

quotes.quote: Tai chi does not mean oriental wisdom or something exotic. It is the wisdom of your own senses, your own mind and body together as one process.
quotes.author: Chungliang Al Huang

quotes.quote: Tai Chi Chuan, the great ultimate, strengthens the weak, raises the sick, invigorates the debilitated, and encourages the timid.
quotes.author: Cheng Man-ch'ing

quotes.quote: The Chinese used the symbol of tai chi, the undifferentiated reality - no separation, no left and right.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Nothing is more harmful to the world than a martial art that is not effective in actual self-defense.
quotes.author: Choki Motobu

quotes.quote: Wushu is the Chinese word for all forms of traditional Chinese Martial Arts. The word Wushu means the 'Are of Not Fighting'; The true Meaning Behind the real Martial Arts.
quotes.author: Jet Li

quotes.quote: Wing Chun is not a game; Its for survival.. for fighting.We don't hit and then wait. No wait.. Once we move, we dont give a chance.
quotes.author: Samuel Kwok

quotes.quote: Wushu it is a philosophy of life. It is designed for defense, and not offense. It is a way to bring you mind back, and body into focus.
quotes.author: Jet Li

quotes.quote: There's simply no counter to Wing Chun done well. No strategies or tactics will ever be able to overcome the brilliance of fluid, simultaneous reactions.
quotes.author: Adam Willis

quotes.quote: Wing Chun does not focus on fighting techniques, instead relaying on fighting and energy principles to be followed at all time.
quotes.author: Wing Chun Sifu Ben Bosboom
